name: Q1 2024 Customer Feedback Analysis
content:
Q1 2024 Customer Feedback Analysis

Overview:

Analysis of customer feedback collected through various channels during Q1 2024 (January - March).

Data Sources:

  • Support tickets: 1,247

  • Customer surveys: 523

  • App store reviews: 892

  • Social media mentions: 3,156

Key Metrics:

  • Overall satisfaction: 4.2/5.0

  • NPS score: 42 (+5 from Q4)

  • Response rate: 28%

  • Resolution time: 4.8 hours

Top Positive Feedback:

  1. UI/UX improvements (42%)

    • New dashboard layout

    • Mobile responsiveness

  2. Performance (38%)

    • Faster load times

    • Better search results

  3. Customer support (35%)

    • Quick response times

    • Helpful solutions

Areas for Improvement:

  1. Integration capabilities (25%)

    • More third-party apps

    • Better API documentation

  2. Reporting features (18%)

    • Custom report builder

    • Export options

  3. Pricing structure (12%)

    • More flexible tiers

    • Volume discounts

Action Items:

  • Prioritize integration roadmap

  • Enhance reporting module

  • Review pricing strategy

  • Expand API documentation

Next Steps:

  1. Share findings with product team

  2. Update Q2 roadmap

  3. Follow up with key accounts
